Pra época em que foi lançado esse foi um jogão da Valve, lembrando muito clássicos como Turok e inspirando outros games (F.E.A.R. e afins). Apenas nas partes finais eu tive alguns problemas por presenciar alguns bugs (gravidade não estava alterada onde deveria) e por sentir uma mesmice no design dos últimos cenários, mas nada comprometedor. Recomendo darem uma chance a esse clássico e posteriormente o 2.
Um clássico incrível e nostálgico, sdds quando a valve fazia só jogo foda
More people need to play this. now. today. It's a really important game that's still extremely fun to play, despite its age.
good old
good
7/10 totaly overrated

Not far from being great to me, but I'm mixed.

+ Weapons variety is nice.
+ Gun sounds are really powerful and loud, I love it.
+ Combat vs aliens is fun.
+ Level design is great until the Xen levels start...
+ Boss battles.
+ Ending is really cool.
+ G-man secret encounters.
+ Mod support, game has tons of fantastic mods. I highly recommend "Afraid of Monsters".

- Combat vs human enemies is really bad, they don't take any reactions from shots or anything, so if you're shooting them, they'll be shooting at the same time too, can't break their shooting cycle, so the only strategy is start shooting first and have enough health... It's cheap.
- Enemies are bullet sponges in a bad way, not huge bullet sponges, but noticable.
- Xen levels... The design is bad... Not that the levels are labyrinths or something, but it's just not fun to play in them, horrible platforming sections and darkness just really sucks.
- Can get stuck easily.
- Many times just not sure what to do, stuff is unexplained, so there are sections, where watching walkthrough is almost a must.
- fall damage sucks ass.


6/10
Just play it. This is history.

The game that brought forth Counter-strike, Half-life puts you in an environment that is never dull with combat and puzzles that don't seem or feel like road blocks. 
The story pulls you in and though the graphics are aged, they are still pleasing to the eye and will take you back to the fun of the 90's and 2000's.
With touches of sci-fi and and an intelligent a.i. for the time, you are in for one the best experiences of all time in one of the best story lines of all time in gaming.

Recommend all players to play at least once, though you will probably come back time and time again.

Side note, the two expansions "Opposing Force" and "Blue Shift" are also just as great of a journey and experience that you'll remember forever.

Deserves to be in every Steam Library.

Jakoś 3min po pisaniu recenzji ukończyłem "pół życie" nie sądziłem, że zajmie mi to 9h. Polecam gierkę naprawdę fajna fabuła oraz klimat szkoda tylko, że gra nie mówi graczowi co ma zrobić szczerze to nic nie mówi, za kostiumem na starcie gry łaziłem z 15min bo nie wiedziałem co mam zrobić ale gierkę przeszedłem i jestem z siebie dumny wiele było sytuacji gdzie wybuchałem agresją przez zamaskowanych ninja co byli zaprogramowani w taki sposób, że za każdym razem gdy ujrzą model naszej postaci zawsze trafiają z opóźnieniem 5ms.

I was lost, I didn't know who I was, or what I wanted, until I played this game everything changed I got a job, I started seeing my kids again, I stopped beating my wife. this game made me a better man. masterpiece!

Tiene una sensación de movimiento y dinámicas impresionantes para la época, que a pesar de tener unos puzzles difíciles o complicados de entender cuando lo juegas por primera vez, llega a ser necesario ver una guía o algo por el estilo.
Incluso la dificultad a nivel medio llega a ser desafiante.

Lo malo es que la versión en inglés tiene un audio pésimo, no se tomen la molestia de jugarlo en inglés. El doblaje de España no está nada mal.
